column5: We are crossing at Thunder Bay. We have never been this way (we usually cross at Int. Falls). We were thinking of staying in Grand Portage MN. but the only hotel we could find is the Grand Portage Lodge/Casino. They are kind of expensive (about $100/night). Does anyone know of an inexpensive hotel in the area? We would like to stay in the US and cross in the early morning. Also if you have any suggestions on crossing at Thunder Bay it would be appreciated.
[font color=green size=3][b]About 15 miles away is Grand Marais, Minn. They have a number of Motels, including a Motel 8, 1-800-247-6020.
If you want to drive to Thunder Bay, there are a number of hotels in the area. Here is a link that will list some of them. http://www.thunderbayhotels.net/ Agate
